directions: In a large serving bowl, toss together the cabbage, onion, and apples. In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, salt, pepper, sugar, lemon juice, and milk. Pour dressing over the cabbage mixture, and toss to coat. Chill until serving.
ingredients: 1/2 medium head red cabbage, finely shredded
2 Fuji apples, peeled, cored and finely diced
title: Purple Apple Slaw
